document_data.name: Mount Hotenow
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Hotenow''' ({{Pronounce|HOE|teh|NOW|refs=<ref>{{Cite web/theedverse/2017-01-23 - Mount Hotenow's Pronunciation}}}}) was an active volcano in the [[Shadowfell]] and a reflection of the [[Mount Hotenow|volcano of the same name]] on the [[Prime Material plane|Prime Material]] world of [[Toril]].
document_data.Description:
This volcano was constantly erupting ash and cinder into the air, occasionally raining small stones, Rivers of magma constantly flowed down from it, into various parts of the woods that surrounded it, These rivers emitted thick gouts of smoke and fires danced along their banks.

The interior of the volcano was full of magmatic caverns, connected to exterior caves. In the hottest and most hazardous depths of the caverns, one could find [[portal]]s to the [[Elemental Chaos]] and Toril.

Geography.Flora & Fauna: A variety of [[elemental]] creatures and fiery [[undead]] inhabited the caves of Mount Hotenow, some of them the [[spirit]]s of beings slain within the volcano's Prime Material counterpart. Such undead included [[blazing skeleton]]s, [[charnel cinderhouse]]s, [[flameborn zombie]]s, [[flameskull]]s, and [[forgewraith]]s.
